languages.text: "Вот и все — сознался. Я не раз говорил, что убийца — один из затаившихся прислужников Кунрада. И вновь оказался прав. Видать, не настолько хорошо мы их вычистили, как думали". {n}Хротко бросает цепкий взгляд на Иокасту.{/n}

"He has admitted to everything, the vermin! I have insisted time and again that the assassination attempt was carried out by one of Voigtvir's surviving henchmen, and I was right. I guess we weren't so thorough in clearing them out as we thought." {n}Hrotko casts a sharp look at Sauerback.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вот и все — сознался. Я не раз говорил, что убийца — один из затаившихся прислужников Кунрада. И вновь оказался прав. Видать, не настолько хорошо мы их вычистили, как думали". {n}Хротко бросает цепкий взгляд на Иокасту.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "He has admitted to everything, the vermin! I have insisted time and again that the assassination was carried out by one of Kunrad's surviving henchmen. And I was right, I guess we weren't so thorough in clearing them out as we thought." {n}Hrotko casts a sharp look at Jocasta.{/n}

"He has admitted to everything, the vermin! I was right after all. This is another conspiracy perpetrated by Voigtvir's surviving henchmen. I guess we weren't so thorough in clearing them out as we thought." {n}Hrotko casts a sharp look at Sauerback.{/n}

"He has admitted to everything, the vermin! I was right after all. This is yet another conspiracy perpetrated by Voigtvir's surviving henchmen. I guess we weren't so thorough in clearing them out as we thought." {n}Hrotko casts a sharp look at Sauerback.{/n}

"He has admitted to everything, the vermin! I have insisted time and again that the assassination was carried out by one of Kunrad's surviving henchmen, and I was right. I guess we weren't so thorough in clearing them out as we thought." {n}Hrotko casts a sharp look at Sauerback.{/n}

"He has admitted to everything, the vermin! I have insisted time and again that the assassination attempt was carried out by one of Voigtvir's surviving henchmen, and I was right. I guess we weren't so thorough in clearing them out as we thought." {n}Hrotko casts a sharp look at Sauerback.{/n}

"He has admitted to everything, the vermin! I have insisted time and again that the assassination was carried out by one of Kunrad's surviving henchmen. And I was right, I guess we weren't so thorough in clearing them out as we thought." {n}Hrotko casts a sharp look at Jocasta.{/n}

"He has admitted to everything, the vermin! I have insisted time and again that the assassination was carried out by one of Kunrad's surviving henchmen, and I was right. I guess we weren't so thorough in clearing them out as we thought." {n}Hrotko casts a sharp look at Sauerback.{/n}

"He has admitted to everything, the vermin! I have insisted time and again that the assassination attempt was carried out by one of Voigtvir's surviving henchmen, and I was right. I guess we weren't so thorough in clearing them out as we thought." {n}Hrotko casts a sharp look at Sauerback.{/n}

languages.text: « Il a tout avoué, le fumier ! Depuis le début, je suis convaincu que cette tentative d'assassinat a été commise par l'un des sbires survivants de Voigtvir, et il s'avère que j'avais vu juste. Il faut croire que la purge que nous avons menée n'a pas été aussi efficace que nous le pensions. » {n}Hrotko adresse à Sauerback un regard chargé de reproches.{/n}
languages.original_text: "He has admitted to everything, the vermin! I have insisted time and again that the assassination attempt was carried out by one of Voigtvir's surviving henchmen, and I was right. I guess we weren't so thorough in clearing them out as we thought." {n}Hrotko casts a sharp look at Sauerback.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Il a tout avoué, le fumier ! Depuis le début, je suis convaincu que cette tentative d'assassinat a été commise par l'un des sbires survivants de Voigtvir, et il s'avère que j'avais vu juste. Il faut croire que la purge que nous avons menée n'a pas été aussi efficace que nous le pensions. » {n}Hrotko adresse à Sauerback un regard chargé de reproches.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Esta escoria lo ha admitido todo! Ya había advertido una y otra vez de que el intento de asesinato era obra de uno de los lacayos de Voigtvir, y tenía razón. Supongo que nos dejamos alguno durante las purgas». {n}Hrotko lanza una mirada penetrante a Sauerback.{/n}
languages.original_text: "He has admitted to everything, the vermin! I have insisted time and again that the assassination attempt was carried out by one of Voigtvir's surviving henchmen, and I was right. I guess we weren't so thorough in clearing them out as we thought." {n}Hrotko casts a sharp look at Sauerback.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Esta escoria lo ha admitido todo! Ya había advertido una y otra vez de que el intento de asesinato era obra de uno de los lacayos de Voigtvir, y tenía razón. Supongo que nos dejamos alguno durante las purgas». {n}Hrotko lanza una mirada penetrante a Sauerback.{/n}

languages.text: “他已经全都招供了，那个人渣！我一次次坚持我的猜测，我认为这一切都是维特威尔的残党策划的阴谋，而事实证明我想得没错。我们本以为已经把那群渣滓全都铲除了，但现在看来，清理得还是不够彻底。”{n}赫洛卡以锐利的目光看着苏尔贝克。{/n}
languages.original_text: "He has admitted to everything, the vermin! I have insisted time and again that the assassination attempt was carried out by one of Voigtvir's surviving henchmen, and I was right. I guess we weren't so thorough in clearing them out as we thought." {n}Hrotko casts a sharp look at Sauerback.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “他已经全都招供了，那个人渣！我一次次坚持我的猜测，我认为这一切都是维特威尔的残党策划的阴谋，而事实证明我想得没错。我们本以为已经把那群渣滓全都铲除了，但现在看来，清理得还是不够彻底。”{n}赫洛卡以锐利的目光看着苏尔贝克。{/n}

languages.text: 「あの害虫がすべてを認めたよ！私は何度も何度も、暗殺未遂はボイドヴィルの生き残った子分の一人の手によるものだと主張してきた。思っていたほど徹底的な掃討作戦ではなかったようだな」{n}フロトコはザウアーバックに鋭い視線を送った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "He has admitted to everything, the vermin! I have insisted time and again that the assassination attempt was carried out by one of Voigtvir's surviving henchmen, and I was right. I guess we weren't so thorough in clearing them out as we thought." {n}Hrotko casts a sharp look at Sauerback.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あの害虫がすべてを認めたよ！私は何度も何度も、暗殺未遂はボイドヴィルの生き残った子分の一人の手によるものだと主張してきた。思っていたほど徹底的な掃討作戦ではなかったようだな」{n}フロトコはザウアーバックに鋭い視線を送った。{/n}

languages.text: "Er hat bereits alles gestanden, dieser Abschaum! Ich habe mehrmals erklärt, dass der Mordversuch von einem der überlebenden Handlanger von Voigtvir unternommen wurde, und ich hatte recht. Wir haben sie offenbar nicht so gründlich ausgerottet wie wir dachten." {n}Hrotko wirft Sauerback einen scharfen Blick zu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "He has admitted to everything, the vermin! I have insisted time and again that the assassination attempt was carried out by one of Voigtvir's surviving henchmen, and I was right. I guess we weren't so thorough in clearing them out as we thought." {n}Hrotko casts a sharp look at Sauerback.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Er hat bereits alles gestanden, dieser Abschaum! Ich habe mehrmals erklärt, dass der Mordversuch von einem der überlebenden Handlanger von Voigtvir unternommen wurde, und ich hatte recht. Wir haben sie offenbar nicht so gründlich ausgerottet wie wir dachten." {n}Hrotko wirft Sauerback einen scharfen Blick zu.{/n}

languages.text: "Haşerenin bulaşmadığı şey kalmamış! Suikast girişiminin Voigtvir'in hayatta kalan yandaşları tarafından gerçekleştirildiğinin defalarca üzerinde durdum ve haklı çıktım. Anlaşılan onları ortadan kaldırma hususunda düşündüğümüz kadar ayrıntılı çalışmamışız." {n}Hrotko, Sauerback'e keskin bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "He has admitted to everything, the vermin! I have insisted time and again that the assassination attempt was carried out by one of Voigtvir's surviving henchmen, and I was right. I guess we weren't so thorough in clearing them out as we thought." {n}Hrotko casts a sharp look at Sauerback.{/n}
